languages.text: "Да ладно тебе! Порадуйся лучше за Эвейна: в его-то возрасте подобные умонастроения сохранить — постараться надо! Благородство — редкое зрелище".

"Oh, cut him some slack, will you? We should be glad for Evayne here. It takes proper effort to still have that kind of attitude at his age! It's not too often you meet someone who's truly honourable."
languages.original_text: "Да ладно тебе! Порадуйся лучше за Эвейна: в его-то возрасте подобные умонастроения сохранить — постараться надо! Благородство — редкое зрелище".

traits.locale_text: "Oh, cut him some slack, will you? We should be glad for Evayne here. It takes proper effort to still have this kind of attitude at his age! Chivalry is a rare bird."
"Oh, cut him some slack, will you? We should be glad for Evayne here. It takes proper effort to still have this kind of attitude at his age! Chivalry is a rare bird."
"Oh, cut him some slack, will you? We should be glad for Evayne here. It takes proper effort to still have that kind of attitude at his age! Chivalry is a rare bird."
"Oh, cut him some slack, will you? We should be glad for Evayne here. It takes proper effort to still have that kind of attitude at his age! Chivalry is a rare bird."

"Oh, cut him some slack, will you? We should be glad for Evayne here. It takes proper effort to still have that kind of attitude at his age! It's not too often you meet someone who's truly honourable."

"Oh, cut him some slack, will you? We should be glad for Evayne here. It takes proper effort to still have that kind of attitude at his age! It's not too often you meet someone who's truly honourable."

languages.text: "Oh, lasst ihn doch in Ruhe, ja? Wir sollten froh sein, dass Evayne hier ist. Es erfordert Anstrengung, in seinem Alter noch so eine Haltung zu haben! Man trifft nicht oft jemanden, der wahrlich ehrenhaft ist."
languages.original_text: "Oh, cut him some slack, will you? We should be glad for Evayne here. It takes proper effort to still have that kind of attitude at his age! It's not too often you meet someone who's truly honourable."

traits.locale_text: "Oh, lasst ihn doch in Ruhe, ja? Wir sollten froh sein, dass Evayne hier ist. Es erfordert Anstrengung, in seinem Alter noch so eine Haltung zu haben! Ritterlichkeit ist ein seltener Vogel."

languages.text: « Oh, arrêtez un peu. On devrait plutôt se réjouir de l'initiative d'Evayne. Il faut de sacrés efforts pour avoir une attitude pareille à son âge ! Ce n'est pas tous les jours que l'on croise un véritable homme d'honneur. »
languages.original_text: "Oh, cut him some slack, will you? We should be glad for Evayne here. It takes proper effort to still have that kind of attitude at his age! It's not too often you meet someone who's truly honourable."

traits.locale_text: « Oh, arrêtez un peu. On devrait plutôt se réjouir de l'initiative d'Evayne. Il faut de sacrés efforts pour avoir une attitude pareille à son âge ! Ce genre de noblesse est de plus en plus rare. »

languages.text: “好啦，咱们就别太苛刻了，好吗？咱们应该为艾维尼感到高兴，到了他这种年纪，还能保持这样的态度，这可不是件容易事！像这种真正可敬的人真是挺罕见的。”
languages.original_text: "Oh, cut him some slack, will you? We should be glad for Evayne here. It takes proper effort to still have that kind of attitude at his age! It's not too often you meet someone who's truly honourable."

traits.locale_text: “好啦，咱们就别太苛刻了，好吗？咱们应该为艾维尼感到高兴，到了他这种年纪，还能保持这样的态度，这可不是件容易事！这样的侠义精神确实相当罕见。”

languages.text: 「あら、多めに見てあげたら？彼の歳でまだあんな態度が取れるなんて、相応の努力がいることよ。喜ばしいことじゃない？今どき高潔な人間に会うことなんてそうそうないんだから」
languages.original_text: "Oh, cut him some slack, will you? We should be glad for Evayne here. It takes proper effort to still have that kind of attitude at his age! It's not too often you meet someone who's truly honourable."

traits.locale_text: 「あら、多めに見てあげたら？エヴァインがここにいてくれることに感謝しなくっちゃ。彼の歳でまだあんな態度が取れるなんて、相応の努力がいることよ。今どき高潔な人に会うことなんて滅多にないんだから」
「あら、多めに見てあげたら？彼の歳でまだあんな態度が取れるなんて、相応の努力がいることよ。喜ばしいことじゃない？今どき高潔な人間に会うことなんてそうそうないんだから」

languages.text: «Vamos, dele un respiro, ¿no? Deberíamos agradecer la forma de pensar de Evayne. ¡Ya es bastante meritorio que muestre esa actitud a su edad! Cuesta encontrar a alguien verdaderamente honorable».
languages.original_text: "Oh, cut him some slack, will you? We should be glad for Evayne here. It takes proper effort to still have that kind of attitude at his age! It's not too often you meet someone who's truly honourable."

traits.locale_text: «Vamos, dele un respiro, ¿no? Deberíamos agradecer la forma de pensar de Evayne. ¡Ya es bastante meritorio que muestre esa actitud a su edad! La gallardía es una cualidad difícil de ver».

languages.text: "Evayne'e o kadar yüklenmesen? Burada olduğu için sevinmeliyiz. Onun yaşında hâlâ böyle bir tutuma sahip olmak, hakikaten yürek ister! Sahiden onurlu biriyle çok sık karşılaşmıyor insan."
languages.original_text: "Oh, cut him some slack, will you? We should be glad for Evayne here. It takes proper effort to still have that kind of attitude at his age! It's not too often you meet someone who's truly honourable."

traits.locale_text: "Evayne'e o kadar yüklenmesen? Burada olduğu için sevinmeliyiz. Onun yaşında hâlâ böyle bir tutuma sahip olmak, hakikaten yürek ister! Sahiden onurlu biriyle çok sık karşılaşmıyor insan."
